title: Create 3D digital marketing website with shopping functionality

requirements.text: Implement a 3D interactive homepage using React Three Fiber with ultra-realistic rendering, including lighting effects, shadows, and smooth camera transitions

quotes: create ultra realistic 3d website for digital marketing

acceptanceCriteria: 3D scene renders with realistic lighting and shadows
Camera movements are smooth and responsive to user interaction
Scene includes interactive 3D elements that respond to mouse hover and click

requirements.text: Create a product catalog system with browsing, filtering, and search capabilities for digital marketing products and services
acceptanceCriteria: Products can be displayed in a grid or list view
Users can filter products by category, price range, and other attributes
Search functionality returns relevant results
Product details include images, descriptions, and pricing

requirements.text: Implement backend data structures and functions in Motoko to store and manage products, including product ID, name, description, price, category, and image URLs
acceptanceCriteria: Product type is defined with all necessary fields
Functions exist to add, update, retrieve, and list products
Products persist across canister upgrades

requirements.text: Build a shopping cart system where users can add products, update quantities, and remove items
acceptanceCriteria: Users can add products to cart with specified quantities
Cart displays all added items with prices and subtotals
Users can update quantities or remove items from cart
Cart total is calculated correctly including all items

requirements.text: Create a checkout flow with order summary, customer information collection, and order confirmation
acceptanceCriteria: Checkout displays complete order summary with itemized list and total
Form collects necessary customer information (name, email, shipping address)
Order is saved to backend with unique order ID and timestamp
Confirmation page displays order details and order number

requirements.text: Implement backend order management system in Motoko to store orders, track order status, and retrieve order history
acceptanceCriteria: Order type includes customer info, items, total, status, and timestamp
Functions exist to create orders and retrieve order history
Orders persist across canister upgrades
Each order has a unique identifier

requirements.text: Design and implement product display cards that integrate into the 3D environment, showing products in an immersive 3D space with interactive elements

quotes: create ultra realistic 3d website for digital marketing

acceptanceCriteria: Products are displayed as 3D cards or objects within the Three.js scene
Product cards are interactive and respond to user input
Clicking a product opens detailed view or adds to cart
3D product displays maintain visual quality and performance

requirements.text: Create a cohesive visual design with a modern, professional aesthetic featuring a sophisticated color palette of deep teals, warm golds, and charcoal grays, elegant typography with clean sans-serif fonts, and a premium layout that emphasizes depth and dimension through layering and strategic use of shadows and highlights
acceptanceCriteria: Color scheme consistently uses deep teals, warm golds, and charcoal grays throughout the interface
Typography is clean and modern with appropriate hierarchy
Layout creates depth through layering, shadows, and visual separation
Overall aesthetic feels premium and professional

constraints: Must use React Three Fiber for all 3D rendering
Backend must use single-actor Motoko architecture
All state management must use React Query

required: Hero background with abstract 3D geometric shapes in deep teal and gold tones (hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
Digital marketing services icon set showing SEO, social media, and analytics in modern minimalist style (services-icons.dim_800x400.png)
Featured product banner showcasing premium digital marketing package with elegant composition (featured-banner.dim_1200x600.png)
